sentences.english: My person is a unique one. Please don't compare me with my brother or sister.
sentences.chinese: 我的人格是獨一無二的，請勿拿我與兄姊比較。

sentences.english: So that could u mind tell me where can i get it ???
sentences.chinese: 黑媽媽兄，我都想知你所講對鏡邊到搵到？

sentences.english: Arrived safe. Thank you C Hing.
sentences.chinese: 已於星期四收到，真系多謝哂c兄。

sentences.english: "Beijing passenger service group" must be very frustrated.
sentences.chinese: 北京客運段兄肯定非常鬱悶。

sentences.english: My cany helmet is quinquangular. From pics brother's seems hexangular .
sentences.chinese: 小弟這頂藤盔上端是五角，從圖看，兄的似乎是六角。

sentences.english: If anyone has any emergency issues, please contact with Brother Lien.
sentences.chinese: 牧師外出時間，兄姊若有緊急事項，請洽連俊堯弟兄。
